turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (s) Hi. I'd like to order three P large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And have all of them be supreme pizzas with thin crust on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large supreme pizzas with thin crust, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how large will your party be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, we'll have a table ready for you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
